_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Counter Strike 1.6 - ReHLDS
author: contact@nelvach.xyz
description: Данное яйцо предназначено для развертывания Counter-Strike 1.6 сервера с использованием ReHLDS и связанных модулей через автоматическую установку из GitHub. Оно предлагает удобный способ развертывания и настройки сервера с расширенной модульной архитектурой.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -e

# Переменные окружения и их значения по умолчанию
REHLDS_VERSION="${REHLDS_VERSION:-latest}"
REGAMEDLL_VERSION="${REGAMEDLL_VERSION:-latest}"
REAPI_VERSION="${REAPI_VERSION:-latest}"
METAMOD_VERSION="${METAMOD_VERSION:-latest}"
AMXMODX_VERSION="${AMXMODX_VERSION:-latest}"
REUNION_VERSION="${REUNION_VERSION:-latest}"
REVOICE_VERSION="${REVOICE_VERSION:-latest}"

# Проверка зависимостей
command -v curl >/dev/null || { echo "[-] curl not installed"; exit 1; }
command -v jq >/dev/null || { echo "[-] jq not installed"; exit 1; }
command -v unzip >/dev/null || { echo "[-] unzip not installed"; exit 1; }

if [[ -z "${STEAM_USER}" ]] || [[ -z "${STEAM_PASS}" ]]; then
    echo -e "Steam user is not set.\nUsing anonymous user."
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "User set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

# Download and install SteamCMD
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server
CSTRIKE_PATH="$HOME/cstrike"

# Install game via SteamCMD
./steamcmd.sh \
+force_install_dir /mnt/server \
+login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} \
+app_set_config 90 mod ${HLDS_GAME} \
$( [[ "${WINDOWS_INSTALL}" == "1" ]] && printf %s '+@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows' ) \
+app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} \
$( [[ -z ${SRCDS_BETAID} ]] || printf %s "-beta ${SRCDS_BETAID}" ) \
$( [[ -z ${SRCDS_BETAPASS} ]] || printf %s "-betapassword ${SRCDS_BETAPASS}" ) \
${INSTALL_FLAGS} validate \
+quit

mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

cd /mnt/server

# Установка HLDS
steamcmd/steamcmd.sh \
  +force_install_dir "$HOME" \
  +login "${STEAM_USER:-anonymous}" "${STEAM_PASS:-}" "${STEAM_AUTH:-}" \
  +app_set_config 90 mod "${HLDS_GAME:-cstrike}" \
  +app_update "${SRCDS_APPID:-90}" validate \
  +quit

install_from_github_release() {
    local NAME=$1
    local REPO=$2
    local VERSION=$3
    local ZIP_URL=""
    local TMP_DIR="${NAME}_install"

    [[ "$VERSION" == "none" ]] && { echo "[+] Skipping... ($NAME)"; return; }

    echo "[?] Installing... ($NAME - ${VERSION})"

    if [[ "$VERSION" == "latest" ]]; then
        RELEASE_DATA=$(curl -s --fail "https://api.github.com/repos/$REPO/releases/latest") || { echo "[-] Failed to fetch latest release for $NAME"; return 1; }
    else
        RELEASE_DATA=$(curl -s --fail "https://api.github.com/repos/$REPO/releases/tags/$VERSION") || { echo "[-] Failed to fetch version $VERSION for $NAME"; return 1; }
    fi

    ZIP_URL=$(echo "$RELEASE_DATA" | jq -r '.assets[] | select(.name | endswith(".zip")) | .browser_download_url')
    [[ -z "$ZIP_URL" ]] && { echo "[-] No .zip asset found for $NAME"; return 1; }

    echo "[?] Downloading... ($ZIP_URL)"
    rm -rf "$TMP_DIR"
    mkdir -p "$TMP_DIR"
    curl -# --fail -L "$ZIP_URL" -o "$TMP_DIR/$NAME.zip" || { echo "[-] Failed to download $NAME"; return 1; }

    echo "[?] Extracting... ($TMP_DIR/$NAME.zip)"
    unzip -q "$TMP_DIR/$NAME.zip" -d "$TMP_DIR" || { echo "[-] Failed to extract $NAME"; return 1; }

    local ADDONS_PATH=$(find "$TMP_DIR" -type d -name addons | head -n 1)

    case "$NAME" in
        rehlds|regamedll)
            cp -rv "$TMP_DIR"/bin/linux32/* "$HOME"
            ;;
        reapi|amxmodx)
            [[ -n "$ADDONS_PATH" ]] && cp -rv "$ADDONS_PATH" "$CSTRIKE_PATH" || return 1
            ;;
        metamod-r)
            cp -r "$TMP_DIR"/addons "$CSTRIKE_PATH"
            mkdir -p "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/metamod"
            touch "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/metamod/plugins.ini"
            grep -qxF "linux addons/amxmodx/dlls/amxmodx_mm_i386.so" "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/metamod/plugins.ini" || \
              echo "linux addons/amxmodx/dlls/amxmodx_mm_i386.so" >> "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/metamod/plugins.ini"

            if grep -q "^gamedll_linux" "$CSTRIKE_PATH/liblist.gam"; then
                sed -i 's|^gamedll_linux.*|gamedll_linux "addons/metamod/metamod_i386.so"|' "$CSTRIKE_PATH/liblist.gam"
            else
                echo 'gamedll_linux "addons/metamod/metamod_i386.so"' >> "$CSTRIKE_PATH/liblist.gam"
            fi
            ;;
        reunion)
            mkdir -p "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/reunion/"
            cp -rv "$TMP_DIR"/bin/Linux/* "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/reunion/" 2>/dev/null || true
            cp -v "$TMP_DIR"/reunion.cfg "$CSTRIKE_PATH/reunion.cfg" 2>/dev/null || true
            mkdir -p "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/metamod/"
            touch "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/metamod/plugins.ini"
            grep -qxF "linux addons/reunion/reunion_mm_i386.so" "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/metamod/plugins.ini" || \
              echo "linux addons/reunion/reunion_mm_i386.so" >> "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/metamod/plugins.ini"
            SALT=$(tr -dc 'A-Za-z0-9' < /dev/urandom | head -c 50)
            sed -i "s/^SteamIdHashSalt\s*=.*/SteamIdHashSalt = $SALT/" "$CSTRIKE_PATH/reunion.cfg"
            ;;
        revoice)
            mkdir -p "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/revoice/"
            cp -rv "$TMP_DIR"/bin/linux32/* "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/revoice/" 2>/dev/null || true
            cp -v "$TMP_DIR"/revoice.cfg "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/revoice/revoice.cfg" 2>/dev/null || true
            mkdir -p "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/metamod/"
            touch "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/metamod/plugins.ini"
            grep -qxF "linux addons/revoice/revoice_mm_i386.so" "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/metamod/plugins.ini" || \
              echo "linux addons/revoice/revoice_mm_i386.so" >> "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/metamod/plugins.ini"
            ;;
    esac

    rm -rf "$TMP_DIR"
    echo "[+] Module $NAME installed successfully!"
}

install_from_github_release "rehlds"        "rehlds/rehlds"                     "$REHLDS_VERSION"
install_from_github_release "regamedll"     "rehlds/ReGameDLL_CS"               "$REGAMEDLL_VERSION"
install_from_github_release "reapi"         "rehlds/reapi"                      "$REAPI_VERSION"
install_from_github_release "metamod-r"     "rehlds/metamod-r"                  "$METAMOD_VERSION"
install_from_github_release "amxmodx"       "Pterodactyl-CS-1-6/amxmodx"        "$AMXMODX_VERSION"
install_from_github_release "reunion"       "rehlds/reunion"                    "$REUNION_VERSION"
install_from_github_release "revoice"       "rehlds/revoice"                    "$REVOICE_VERSION"

mkdir -p "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/amxmodx/data"
touch "$CSTRIKE_PATH/banned.cfg"
touch "$CSTRIKE_PATH/listip.cfg"
touch "$CSTRIKE_PATH/addons/amxmodx/data/csstats.dat"

chmod -R 777 "$HOME"

echo "[+] Installation completed successfully!"

variables.name: Server Hostname
variables.description: Имя сервера, отображаемое в списке серверов.

variables.name: Map
variables.description: Карта, которая будет загружена при запуске сервера.

variables.name: ReHLDS Version
variables.description: Версия движка ReHLDS. Укажите latest для установки последней версии.

variables.name: AmxModX Version
variables.description: Версия AmxModX. Поддерживаются: 1.8.2, 1.8.3, 1.9.0, 1.10.0, либо none для отключения.

variables.name: ReAPI
variables.description: Версия ReAPI (расширенный API для AmxModX и движка).

variables.name: Game ID
variables.description: Steam App ID игры. Для HLDS должен быть равен 90.

variables.name: Beta branch
variables.description: Ветка Steam. Для установки старой версии укажите steam_legacy, иначе оставьте пустым.

variables.name: Validate
variables.description: Проверка целостности файлов игры через SteamCMD. Не рекомендуется использовать с ReHLDS.
